title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 215.2 - Policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 215.2 - Policy

State Regulations

It is the policy of the Unified Court System
that litigants, where practicable, should file or submit to the courts of the

Unified Court System of the State of New York papers printed or reproduced on
recycled paper. Paper is considered recycled if it contains a minimum content
of 30 percent waste paper. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
215.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
